item.title: FactoryGirl: 'has_and_belongs_to_many' associations and the 'NoMethodError'
item.description: We ran into a somewhat frustrating problem while using Factory Girl to create an object which had a 'has_and_belongs_to_many' association with another object. The relevant code in the two classes was like this.. class Bar < ActiveRecord::Base has_and_belongs_to_many :foos, :class_name => "Foo", :join-table => "bar_foos" end class Foo < ActiveRecord::Base has_many :bars end …​and we originally defined our 'Bar' factory like so: Factory.define :bar do |f| f.association(:foos, :factory => :foo) end Factory.
